languages.text: "Нас лишили иллюзий. Арбитес привезли нас сюда и бросили гнить. Годами мы дожидались шанса героически умереть во имя {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}, а потом поняли, что нет больше никакого Империума. Есть только Расколотое Небо".

traits.locale_text: "Нас лишили иллюзий. Арбитес привезли нас сюда и бросили гнить. Годами мы дожидались шанса героически умереть во имя {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}, а потом поняли, что нет больше никакого Империума. Есть только Расколотое Небо".

languages.text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."
languages.original_text: "Нас лишили иллюзий. Арбитес привезли нас сюда и бросили гнить. Годами мы дожидались шанса героически умереть во имя {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g}, а потом поняли, что нет больше никакого Империума. Есть только Расколотое Небо".

traits.locale_text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the Imperium, until we realised there never was an Imperium. The Riven Sky is all there is."

"Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the Imperium, until we realised there never was an Imperium. The Riven Sky is all there is."

"Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

"Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

"Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

languages.text: «Nuestras ilusiones quedaron quebradas. Los Arbites nos trajeron aquí y nos abandonaron aquí para que nos pudriéramos. Pasamos años esperando nuestra oportunidad de morir heroicamente en nombre del {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} hasta que comprendimos que ya no existía. Ya solo queda... el Cielo Desgarrado».
languages.original_text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestras ilusiones quedaron quebradas. Los Arbites nos trajeron aquí y nos abandonaron aquí para que nos pudriéramos. Pasamos años esperando nuestra oportunidad de morir heroicamente en nombre del Imperium hasta que comprendimos que ya no existía. Ya solo queda... el Cielo Desgarrado».

«Nuestras ilusiones quedaron quebradas. Los Arbites nos trajeron aquí y nos abandonaron aquí para que nos pudriéramos. Pasamos años esperando nuestra oportunidad de morir heroicamente en nombre del Imperium hasta que comprendimos que ya no existía. Ya solo queda... el Cielo Desgarrado».

languages.text: “我们的理想破灭了。那些法务官把我们带到这里，任由我们自生自灭。这么多年来，我们一直等待着机会，渴望以{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}的名义英勇献身。可现在，我们终于意识到：帝国已经不复存在，如今只剩下……破碎之空。”
languages.original_text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

traits.locale_text: “我们的理想破灭了。那些法务官把我们带到这里，任由我们自生自灭。这么多年来，我们一直等待着机会，渴望以帝国的名义英勇献身。可现在，我们终于意识到：帝国已经不复存在，如今只剩下……破碎之空。”
“我们的理想破灭了。那些法务官把我们带到这里，任由我们自生自灭。这么多年来，我们一直等待着机会，渴望以帝国的名义英勇献身。可现在，我们终于意识到：帝国已经不复存在，如今只剩下……破碎之空。”

languages.text: 「俺たちの幻想は砕け散った。裁定局は俺たちをここに連れてきて、腐っていくままにした。長年、俺たちが気がつくまで、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}の名において英雄的な死の機会を待ち望んでいたが、帝国は終わった。すべては…割れた空だ」
languages.original_text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちの幻想は砕け散った。裁定局は俺たちをここに連れてきて、腐っていくままにした。長年、俺たちが気がつくまで、帝国の名において英雄的な死の機会を待ち望んでいたが、帝国は終わった。すべては…割れた空だ」
「俺たちの幻想は砕け散った。裁定局は俺たちをここに連れてきて、腐っていくままにした。長年、俺たちが気がつくまで、帝国の名において英雄的な死の機会を待ち望んでいたが、帝国は終わった。すべては…割れた空だ」

languages.text: « Toutes nos belles illusions ont volé en éclats. L'Arbites nous a amenés ici avant de nous abandonner à notre sort. Des années durant, nous avons espéré en vain une occasion de mourir en héros au nom de l'{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, jusqu'au jour où nous avons fini par comprendre... Il n'y a plus d'Imperium qui tienne. Tout ce qui reste, c'est... la Fracture Céleste. »
languages.original_text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes nos belles illusions ont volé en éclats. L'Arbites nous a amenés ici avant de nous abandonner à notre sort. Des années durant, nous avons espéré en vain une occasion de mourir en héros au nom de l'Imperium, jusqu'au jour où nous avons fini par comprendre... Il n'y a plus d'Imperium qui tienne. Tout ce qui reste, c'est... la Fracture Céleste. »

« Toutes nos belles illusions ont volé en éclats. L'Arbites nous a amenés ici avant de nous abandonner à notre sort. Des années durant, nous avons espéré en vain une occasion de mourir en héros au nom de l'Imperium, jusqu'au jour où nous avons fini par comprendre... Il n'y a plus d'Imperium qui tienne. Tout ce qui reste, c'est... la Fracture Céleste. »

languages.text: "Yanılsamalarımız paramparça oldu. Yargıcılar bizi buraya getirip çürümeye terk etti. Yıllarca İmparatorluk adına kahramanca ölme şansımızı bekledik. Sonra fark ettik ki {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}İmparatorluk{/g} yok olmuş. Var olan tek şey de Çatlak Gök."
languages.original_text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

traits.locale_text: "Yanılsamalarımız paramparça oldu. Yargıcılar bizi buraya getirip çürümeye terk etti. Yıllarca İmparatorluk adına kahramanca ölme şansımızı bekledik. Sonra fark ettik ki İmparatorluk yok olmuş. Var olan tek şey de Çatlak Gök."

"Yanılsamalarımız paramparça oldu. Yargıcılar bizi buraya getirip çürümeye terk etti. Yıllarca İmparatorluk adına kahramanca ölme şansımızı bekledik. Sonra fark ettik ki {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}İmparatorluk{/g} yok olmuş. Var olan tek şey de Çatlak Gök."

languages.text: "Unsere Illusionen wurden zerstört. Die Arbites haben uns hier verrotten lassen. Wir haben jahrelang auf unsere Chance gewartet, im Namen des {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperiums{/g} ehrenhaft zu sterben, bis wir erkannte, dass es das Imperium nicht mehr gibt. Es gibt nur noch ... den Gespaltenen Himmel."
languages.original_text: "Our illusions were shattered. The Arbites brought us here and left us to rot. For years, we waited for our chance to die heroically in the name of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}, until we realised: the Imperium is gone. All there is... is the Riven Sky."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Illusionen wurden zerstört. Die Arbites haben uns hier verrotten lassen. Wir haben jahrelang auf unsere Chance gewartet, im Namen des Imperiums ehrenhaft zu sterben, bis wir erkannte, dass es das Imperium nicht mehr gibt. Es gibt nur noch ... den Gespaltenen Himmel."

"Unsere Illusionen wurden zerstört. Die Arbites haben uns hier verrotten lassen. Wir haben jahrelang auf unsere Chance gewartet, im Namen des Imperiums ehrenhaft zu sterben, bis wir erkannte, dass es das Imperium nicht mehr gibt. Es gibt nur noch ... den Gespaltenen Himmel."
